extends java.lang.Object

    • Method Detail

      • getDown

        public int getDown()
        Get the value of the current down
        Returns:
        An integer representing the current down.

      • playGame

        public void playGame()
        Start a game and use the pre-determined plays to simulate a drive. This method will call runPlay() at key points to allow the play to be simulated independently.

      • runPlay

        public abstract int runPlay(Play play)
        This abstract method will run the play, handle any exceptions that might be thrown.
        Parameters:
        play - The play object that is to be ran
        Returns:
        the number of penalty yards on the play, zero if no penalty occurs.
